test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality by covering scenarios of successful login, invalid credentials, missing username, missing password, an empty request body, and an authentication service exception.

The tests verify the functionality of the login endpoint in the account lock controller, checking scenarios like successful login, invalid data, wrong password, account locked, no data, and empty data handling.

The tests verify the login functionality of an account lockout controller. They cover scenarios of successful login, failed login due to incorrect password, user account being locked, and invalid login data handling.
